laboratory_examinations.findings: Leukocytosis (leukocyte count, cells/L) - exact count not provided.
Elevated liver enzymes: AST 57 IU/L, ALT 142 IU/L, alkaline phosphatase 300 IU/L, g-glutamyl transferase 463 IU/L, total bilirubin 183 mmol/L, conjugated bilirubin 128 mmol/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The results of his renal and liver function tests were not normal by then, but we assumed that the increased values were unrelated to the Legionella species infection.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Bronchoalveolar lavage fluid specimen was positive by a real-time PCR for all strains belonging to the genus Legionella.
